amendment.description: To prohibit the use of funds by the United States Government to enter into an agreement with the Government of Iraq that would subject members of the Armed Forces to the jurisdiction of Iraq criminal courts or punishment under Iraq law.

action.text: Amendment SA 4858 proposed by Senator Boxer.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4858 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 97 - 0. Record Vote Number: 225.
